summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Ambulatorio Infermieristico MVP. Backend APIs working correctly with proper authentication and access control. Frontend UI flows functional with successful login, ambulatory selection, and navigation. Villa delle Ginestre correctly restricts to PICC-only functionality.

minor_bugs.issue: Returns 200 instead of 201 for successful patient creation
minor_bugs.impact: Cosmetic - functionality works correctly but wrong HTTP status code

passed_tests: Login with Domenico (access to both ambulatories)
Login with Giovanna (access only to PTA Centro)
Patient creation in PTA Centro (MED patients allowed)
Patient creation in Villa Ginestre (only PICC allowed)
Villa Ginestre rejects MED patient creation
Document filtering (Villa shows only PICC documents)
Agenda page loads with time slots
Calendar and time slot endpoints working
Villa delle Ginestre PICC-only note displayed
Patient type dropdown correctly filtered by ambulatory
action_item_for_main_agent: Minor fix needed: Update patient creation endpoint to return HTTP 201 instead of 200 for successful creation. All core functionality is working correctly.

success_percentage.backend: 93% (13/14 tests passed - 1 minor status code issue)
